titleStmt.title: A Guide to knowledge, or, An Introduction into the fundamentals of religion wherein is succinctly handled the principal methods taken up and proceeded in by God from the days of eternity to the end of time in order to effect the eternal salvation of men.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for the author and sold by Tho. Fabian,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
